properties.address: Lochaber Hope, Fort William, Inverness-shire PH33 6XX
properties.description: New Connections is a community hub located at the top of the Highstreet in Fort William. We are a warm welcoming space open to all! With free wifi, and the kettle is always on! There are a variety of social and support groups which meet here, along with one off community events. The space hosts a free soup lunch every Tuesday, and a pop up cafe on Fridays.
properties.title: New Connections
